      • withPersistence

        public ServiceTest.Setup withPersistence(boolean enabled)
        Disable or enable persistence, including Cassandra startup.

      • withCluster

        public ServiceTest.Setup withCluster(boolean enabled)
        Disable or enable cluster and pubsub. If cluster is disabled the persistence is also disabled, since cluster is a prerequisite for persistence.

      • withConfigureBuilder

        public ServiceTest.Setup withConfigureBuilder(java.util.function.Function<play.inject.guice.GuiceApplicationBuilder,play.inject.guice.GuiceApplicationBuilder> transformation)
        Transformation of the Guice builder. Can for example be used to override bindings to stub out dependencies to other services.
